CustomField.formula: IF ( ( Order_Placed_Date_Time__c - CreatedDate) > 0, FLOOR( (Order_Placed_Date_Time__c - CreatedDate)) *24*60 + FLOOR( 24 * ( (Order_Placed_Date_Time__c - CreatedDate) - FLOOR((Order_Placed_Date_Time__c - CreatedDate)) )) *60 + ROUND(60 * (ROUND( 24 * ( (Order_Placed_Date_Time__c - CreatedDate) - FLOOR((Order_Placed_Date_Time__c - CreatedDate)) ),8) - FLOOR( ROUND( 24 * ( (Order_Placed_Date_Time__c - CreatedDate) - FLOOR((Order_Placed_Date_Time__c - CreatedDate)) ),8)) ),0) , NULL)
CustomField.label: Time to Order Placed
